education_text.0: Hans Peter Moravec (born November 30, 1948,      Kautzen,      Austria) is an adjunct faculty member at the      Robotics Institute Robotics Institute of      Carnegie Mellon University Carnegie Mellon University in      Pittsburgh, USAMoravec joined the newly established      Robotics Institute Robotics Institute at Carnegie Mellon in 1980 as a research scientist, becoming research professor in 1995Moravec joined the newly established      Robotics Institute Robotics Institute at Carnegie Mellon in 1980 as a research scientist, becoming research professor in 1995In his 1988 book Mind Children,          Moravec outlines
